headline.main: KEARNY INCIDENT FAKE, SAYS BERLIN; Nazi Press Comment Charges Roosevelt Created Case to Get Vote in Congress ONE PAPER USES 'LIE' Reich Officials Assert Their Navy Has Not Reported Attacking U.S. Destroyer

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Oct. 19 -- The charge that the incident of the torpedoing of the United States destroyer Kearny was invented by President Roosevelt "to bamboozle Congress, with genuine Jewish unscrupulousness," into modifying the Neutrality Act characterized comments that appeared suddenly in this morning's Berlin press, after the incident had not been so much as mentioned to the German public for two days.
